name: Eugene LAMBERT, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Lambert v. Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia County

parties: Eugene LAMBERT, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of July, 2015, the Application for Leave to Pile Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is GRANTED to the extent it seeks mandamus relief. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is DIRECTED to adjudicate Petitioner’s pending petition within 90 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
120 A.3d 298
Eugene LAMBERT, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 62 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 22, 2015.
